categories: Category:Star Wars Adventures: The Weapon of a Jedi

nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures: The Weapon of a Jedi

Star Wars Adventures: The Weapon of a Jedi is a two-issue comic book miniseries written by Alec Worley, adapted from the junior novel by Jason Fry. The series is a reprint of the previously released German miniseries Star Wars: The Weapon of a Jedi. It began the release of the first issue by IDW Publishing in on May 26, 2021.
